Text: Are these in PDF format or txt or what?
Thanks for taking the time and making the effort to put together such an incredible collection.
nice shut, upload more books. I'm trying to find world literature writen in a text document but I can't find any here.
Dear Pyrumian: your sharing is much appreciated, but many of us would appreciate it much more if you used the pdf format.  Can you? Will you?
whos "many of us"? PDF is the worst thing, ever.

sorry for not answering sooner. 
1 No i will not do these in PDF
